colors.slate: radial-gradient(ellipse at top left, #000, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at center left, #0f20be, transparent), 		radial-gradient(ellipse at top right, #f81e9c, transparent), 		radial-gradient(ellipse at center, #ff0000, transparent), radial-gradient(circle at bottom right, #000, transparent)

fonts.base: "-apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'"
